long_description: The protective SolarFocus Solar lighted cover for the Kindle 4 provides auxiliary power via an integrated solar panel and includes a built-in reading lamp. No straps or latches to mess with-simply slip your Kindle 4 into the stylish leatherette cover and press it into place. Reserve battery supplements your Kindle 4's battery for extended readihng time and provides up to 50 hrs. of power to the reading lamp. Sturdy solar panel on the front of the cover continuously charges the reserve battery in sunlight or shade. Pop-up reading lamp provides up to 800 lux light, illuminating the screen surface for after-dark reading; it automatically turns on when released and turns off when put back. The SolarFocus Solar lighted cover features a 3-color LED indicator that shows the reserve battery's remaining strength.
short_description: The protective SolarFocus Solar lighted cover for the Kindle 4 provides auxiliary power via an integrated solar panel and includes a built-in reading lamp.
